roleset.name: pay back

role.descr: thing bought or paid for, compensated for what?

example.name: just transitive
example.text: [The trust]-1, created *trace*-1 as part of Manville's bankruptcy-law reorganization *trace*-1 to compensate victims of asbestos-related diseases, owns 7.2 million of the Series A convertible preferred shares, which are each convertible into 10 Manville common shares.

example.name: args 1 2 3
example.text: The merger agreement says [the buy-out group]-1 is entitled *trace*-1-2 to be repaid *trace*-2 $26.7 million in fees for its investment bankers, Lazard Freres& Co. and Salomon Brothers Inc., and its law firm, Paul Weiss Rifkind Wharton & Garrison.
example.arg: for its investment bankers, Lazard Freres& Co. and Salomon Brothers Inc., and its law firm, Paul Weiss Rifkind Wharton & Garrison

example.name: NP only, args 1 & 2
example.text: compensation to French enterprises for contracts broken by theKhomeini regime
example.arg: for contracts broken by the Khomeini regime

example.name: Arg1
example.text: Italy refuses to pay compensation for more than 30 years ofcolonial rule.
example.arg: for more than 30 years of colonial rule

example.name: Args 1, 2 & 3
example.text: Their compensation of $100 a month for working 17-hour days with no days off amounted to a wage of roughly 20 cents an hour.
example.arg: for working 17-hour days with no days off

example.name: Args 1 & 2
example.text: The actual compensation of employees for 2000 hours of labor rose from $1554 to $4550.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2 and ARG3 and ARG1
example.text: We all know that Iran can just hint to Abd Al Aziz Al Hakim , who wanted to compensate it with a hundred billion dollars from the aliment of the Iraqi people for its war with Iraq , or to the fascist militia leaders like the Sadr militia , which implemented the execution judgment with the recognition of the Iraqi government , to postpone the hanging , especially as the Americans had confirmed that they were against the execution on the holy day .
example.arg: with a hundred billion dollars from the aliment of the Iraqi people

roleset.note: COMPENSATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'compensate' based on sentences in financial subcorpusand automatic expansion via verbnet. (from compensate.01-v predicate notes)

COMPENSATION-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry compensate.01, OntoNotes grouping compensation-n senses 1, 2& 3; maps to VN classes equip-13.4.2-1-1 & judgement-33. Framed by Claire. (from compensation.01-n)
